attributes.action: Bar Tony Blair  from eligability for the position of European President
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Blair is a proven liar, he has taken this country into an illegal war and has consistently failed in his duties and responsibilities to the British people as both an MP and Prime Minister. To allow him to stand for this position would be a  further insult  to the British people following his broken promise to hold a referendum on our membership of the EU.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
